title: The refurbishment of Dram Tree Park and the boat ramp has dragged on well past the originally announced completion date.  What is the reason for the delay and when is it expected to be reopened to the public?  Also, was anything of historical interest unearthed during the excavation of the contaminated soil on the site?
text: Here's a link to the answer to your question. http://www.myreporter.com/?p=8163
